name: Snooze Hammer
description:
Headphones recommended! (also this game is loud!) also i recommend playing in fullscreen.

A very short game I made for Minijam 18: Dreams, about a dream that I have often.

sometimes my brain just adds my alarms to the dream, as clocks in the walls for example, so that I don't wake up.

Follow me on twitter if you like my game? it's easier to sleep after i get some likes.
